title: Drawing, ""Balustrades des Orchestres du Grand Carre aux champs-Elysees (1833)"", 1833
medium:
Brush, pen, watercolor, graphite
Support: off-white paper mounted on off-white paper
inscribed: For mount inscriptions (and source for title) see catalogue information for 1991-17-2
description: Design for two different red-bordered square panels.  Right: Dark green square with a diamond-shaped white insert, decorated with a blue arabesque design.  Left: Dark purple square with an octagonal white insert, decorated with a blue arabesque design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ""Balustrades des Orchestres du Grand Carre aux champs-Elysees (1833)"", 1833. Brush, pen, watercolor, graphite
Support: off-white paper mounted on off-white paper. 1991-17-4.
